name: Ian Pan
body:
### Ian Pan
Hi, my name is Ian. I'm currently a fourth-year undergraduate student at Brown University, concurrently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics-Biology and a Master of Arts in Biostatistics. I will be attending Warren Alpert Medical School beginning Fall 2016. 

My interests lie in data science, translational genomics, biomedical informatics and healthcare. I believe data has the power to transform the way we take care of patients by making healthcare delivery more efficient and medical treatments more personalized, effective and accessible.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
